verses.name: Proverbs 12:6
verses.text: The words of the wicked are to lie in wait for blood: but the mouth of the upright shall deliver them.

verses.name: Proverbs 12:7
verses.text: The wicked are overthrown, and are not: but the house of the righteous shall stand.

verses.name: Proverbs 12:8
verses.text: A man shall be commended according to his wisdom: but he that is of a perverse heart shall be despised.

verses.name: Proverbs 12:9
verses.text: He that is despised, and hath a servant, is better than he that honoureth himself, and lacketh bread.

verses.name: Proverbs 12:10
verses.text: A righteous man regardeth the life of his beast: but the tender mercies of the wicked are cruel.
